title: Big Bite Sugar Rush
desc: Calling all Sugar Fanatics! The inaugrual Big Bite Sugar Rush is coming to the OC Fair & Event Center December 5th & 6th.? Sugar Rush will be a one-of-a kind dessert showcase and sweet market experience packed with entertainment, competitions, demonstrations, cookie decorating for children, walk-about tastings of decadent and delicious sweet treats and shopping from some of the best pastry chefs and confectioners in Southern California. Foodie enthusiasts will satisfy their sweet tooth with an overload of artisan desserts in an unparalleled sugar shoppe environment as they prepare for the holiday season. This two day event will offer a choice of Saturday, December 5th or Sunday, December 6th. ?VIP sugar lovers will gain entry to the event one hour prior to general admission guests, access to the exclusive VIP sugar lounge, and a souvenir swag bag. The sweetest event you'll ever taste! All alcohol service is required to end 30 prior to the end of each session/event. ? All tickets are nontransferable, nonrefundable, and valid only on the date for which they have been purchased, during regularly scheduled operating hours, excluding activities and/or events priced separately.??Tickets issued complimentarily shall not be exchangeable.?
